Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI

Class ClientCLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI.ClientCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewObserver, View
public class ClientCLI extends Object implements View
This class implements all the visual functions needed by the CLI version of the game to run. Implements View in order to offer the player the choice to play in CLI or in GUI (both views) and implements all the methods offered by the interface plus others needed only by this type of graphic.

    • printMatchResults

      public void printMatchResults​(String nickname, Map<String,​Integer> ranking)
      Prints the match results after the game's end. First of all, sorts the map by value, then surrounds the ranking with a yellow frame and offers text information about the rematch.
      Specified by:
      printMatchResults in interface View
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of this player
      ranking - the complete ranking.
